pageContext.claim: “Only 11 percent, in a new poll, favor the starting of this ridiculous impeachment hearings that are going on.”
pageContext.analysis: There has been no recent poll that showed only 11 percent support for impeachment. (It's possible Trump was thinking of a a July Economist/YouGov poll in which 11 percent of Republicans supported impeachment.) In a Fox News poll in June, 43 percent said Trump should be impeached and removed from office, and another 7 percent said he should be impeached but not removed.
